title: What is the significance of famous magnetizers, discussed by Donato, in inducing unconsciousness in a subject?
first_phrase: In the previous section, a group of doctors and researchers were conducting an experiment on a subject who was in a state of heightened fascination. In the last 200 tokens, the doctors are struggling to keep the subject awake, as he has fallen into a state of unconsciousness. Donato, the lead researcher, explains that this can happen spontaneously and discusses the difficulties of distinguishing between sleep and fascination. Le sujet étant parfaitement éveillé, ses yeux se dessilleraient bientôt si je cessais de m’occuper de lui. 11 en serait différemment si j’avais plonge le sujet dans l’état d’inconscience dont nous nous occuperons tout à l’heure. last_phrase: In conclusion, recognizing the state of unconsciousness in a subject can be challenging, but with proper training and experience, it can be achieved.
